Introduction

Kan Miyoun is a South Korean singer and actress currently under STARHUE Entertainment. She originally debuted in 1997 in the girl group Baby V.O.X, after their disbandment she re-debuted as a solo artist under the stage name Miyoun with the album "Refreshing" in 2006.

She went onto debuting in China and is currently active in both South Korean and Chinese media. She also created a fashion line named 'Kanderella' in 2010. She made her musical acting debut in 2017 with the musical "I Love You".
